Black Magic

Published in 1969

Black Magic by Amiri Baraka is a collection of poetry written by Baraka from the time period of 1961 to 1967. This period of time was a period of transition in Barakaâ€™s life, as he began to shed his connections to the predominately white New York School and embraced his Blackness and Black culture.
